history.content:
Declaration applications get process about 4-6 weeks after the application due date, which is Dec 30th for fall. If you get lucky, your application might be processed before adjustment starts, but don't count on it.

edit: for summer the deadline is August 30. Unfortunately this is after adjustment so you're likely out of luck unless they process summer applications differently.

Declaration applications get process about 4-6 weeks after the application due date, which is Dec 30th for fall. If you get lucky, your application might be processed before adjustment starts, but don't count on it.

Declaration application get process about 4-6 weeks after the application due date, which is Dec 30th for fall. If you get lucky, your application might be processed before adjustment starts, but don't count on it.

children.subject: For me it was in December, but I believe the process is similar if you submit by the August deadline. They'd take about 4 weeks after the deadline to process.
@Anon. Poet: Are you speaking from your experience? Did you finish your last prereq in the summer and were you unable to sign up?

history.content:
If I take the last course that I need to declare in the summer and apply for declaration immediately after that, will I get enrolment priority as a declared Computer Science major in the Fall? Of course, when I add the class in phase-2 right now, I am going to be put on the waitlist, but I am confused about whether my application will be processed in time and I will be put off the waitlist at the beginning of the Fall semester. 

Thank you!
history.subject: Fall Enrolment Priority
